content_html: The film "Saiyara," directed by Mohit Suri, was first released in movie theaters on July 18th. It featured a new pair of actors, Ahan Pande and Anit Padka, in a romantic drama. The movie was promoted as a classic love story and was compared to famous romantic films from the past like "Dilwale Dulhania

title: Saiyara Becomes a Streaming Sensation After Theatrical Run
